#Text=Wikinews attends ComicCon in Bangalore , India
#Text=Friday , December 8 , 2017
#Text=Cosplayers dressed up like Marvel comic 's Loki and Spider-Man ; depicting Loki 's wish to rule the Earth .
#Text=Image : Acagastya .
#Text=( Reuseterms . )
#Text=Wikinews attended the Bangalore Comic Con comic-book convention on Saturday .
#Text=Beginning on Saturday morning , it continued through to Sunday .

#Text=Organised by Comic Con India , who organised Comic Con in Hyderabad in October and Mumbai in November , this event was held at Karnataka Trade Promotion Organisation ( KTPO) 's convention hall .
#Text=Wikinews spoke to convention guests Sailesh Gopalan and John Layman .
#Text=Freelancer comic book artist and illustrator Scott Hampton , known for sketching Batman , Black Widow , Sandman , Hellraiser and Star Trek , was among the featured guests at the convention .

#Text=Along with him , professional cosplayer Tabitha Lyons , who dressed up like DC Comics 's Wonder Woman on Saturday ; freelancer comic book writer John Layman , writer of Chew , published by Image Comics ; creator of Zen Pencils Gavin Aung Than ; and creator of Brown Paperbag comics Sailesh Gopalan also attended the event as special guests .
#Text=The event started at 11 AM IST ( 0530 UTC ) .
#Text=Crossing between the genres of science fiction , horror , anime , fantasy and comics , the event sprawled throughout all corners of the facility .
#Text=Marvel Zone , Amazon Video zone , AXN Live RED Special Session , Star Wars ' Last Jedi zone and OnePlus smartphone zone attracted large number of audience .
#Text=OnePlus , who were one of the sponsors of the event , had an exclusive launch of their new smartphone OnePlus 5T Star Wars , limited edition at about 5:30 PM .
#Text=Marvel , Star Wars and AXN Live RED zones had quizzes about the Marvel Cinematic Universe , Star Wars , and the Sherlock Holmes TV series .
#Text=Most of the Marvel questions were about the upcoming live action movie Black Panther .
#Text=Holy Cow entertainment launched latest issues of their comics Age of Immortals and Caster .
#Text=The Comic Con panel included sessions with Sailesh Gopalan about webcomics , Zen pencils creator Gavin Aung Than , as well as Scott Hampton .
#Text=Focusing on Indian mythology , Indian comic book publisher Amar Chitra Katha conducted a quiz , and asked questions like , " Who was the mother of Nakul and Sahdev ?

#Text=After a joke about professor Utonium from The Powepuff Girls  making girls in his basement with a secret recipe " , he asked the audience rhetorically if Indian chef Sanjeev Kapoor shared the recipe on his show .

column1: #Text=He said he had presented the same joke in Delhi , but people did not get it , hinting about the sex ratio .
#Text=He later added " it was because I said in English " , a comment towards Delhi 's literacy rate .
#Text=However , Shah told the Bangalore audience in Hindi .
#Text=Some other jokes stereotyped certain ethnic groups , and classed of the Indian society , discussing the cussing habits of people in Delhi and comparing it with that of Mumbai .
#Text=He also made fun of US president Donald Trump , saying " the Americans voted for an orange alien " .
